title: Paxton Court
description: A close circle of friends, gay and lesbian couples, move to Paxton Court to build their dream homes together only to discover very mixed attitudes amonst their neighbours. In the midst of this, they must deal with aging, changing relationships and death of love ones. Insightful, erotic, and evilly funny, this portrays the foibles and fears of both gays and straight.
author: Diane Salvatore
